summary: Provides a Qt widget that visualizes a collection of Tag objects using a flow layout, and offers user interactions to add, edit, remove, and replace tags. The widget emits signals for tag changes, integrates with tag-building dialogs, and coordinates with other UI components such as tag displays, field widgets, and modal panels.
business_intent: Enable endâ€‘users of the TagStudio application to efficiently organize and modify tags associated with media items, improving content categorization, searchability, and workflow within the tagging system.
